title: Controller - Trenton Thunder (Trenton, NJ)
text:
Controller - Trenton Thunder (Trenton, NJ) 
Overview: 
Minor League Baseball Team (Trenton Thunder) located in Trenton, NJ is seeking an experienced controller to join its team. Ideal candidates will have experience as a Controller or Assistant Controller in a mid-size private company or public accounting experience. This position is responsible for the overall financial management of the company and subsidiary. 

· BA/BS in accounting finance or other related major 
· Approximately 5+ years of progressive accounting experience, including previous supervisory duties 
· Proficient computer skills, including Microsoft Office 
· Excellent communication skills both verbal and written 
Responsibilities Include: 
· Preparation of all financial reports on a monthly basis. 
· Report to senior management and alert them to procedural and substantive financial issues. 
· Work with independent auditor in review of financial transactions and audit preparation. 
· Establish and maintain internal control and policies. 
· Filing of required tax estimates and tax returns, and coordination with accounting firm for all tax compliance matters. 
· Cash management. 
· Prepare and oversee monthly accounts receivable and accounts payable. 
· Prepare monthly bank reconciliations. 
· Prepare annual budget and monitor revenues and expenses. 
· Preparation of payroll and maintenance of related records and reports. 
· General ledger accounting. 
· Preparation of depreciation and amortization schedules on capital assets. 
START DATE: September/October 2015
